title: How to Install Windows 8.1 Preview

steps.headline: Back up all files and programs.
Download Windows 8.1 preview ISO from the official website (http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-8/preview-iso)
Insert a blank disk into your Disk tray.
Burn the ISO image to a disk.
Reboot your PC with the disk still in the tray.
Go to your BIOS configuration screen.
Choose primary boot device as CD/DVD drive.
The system should boot to the Windows 8.1 setup screen.
steps.description: If it doesn't you probably did something wrong.

steps.headline: Configure your PC settings in the setup.
Follow the setup instructions till the setup finishes.

text: Back up all files and programs.  Download Windows 8.1 preview ISO from the official website (http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-8/preview-iso)  Insert a blank disk into your Disk tray.  Burn the ISO image to a disk.  Reboot your PC with the disk still in the tray.  Go to your BIOS configuration screen.  Choose primary boot device as CD/DVD drive.  Reboot again.  The system should boot to the Windows 8.1 setup screen. If it doesn't you probably did something wrong. Use this product key :- NTTX3-RV7VB-T7X7F-WQYYY-9Y92F .  Configure your PC settings in the setup.  Follow the setup instructions till the setup finishes.  Windows 8.1 preview is now installed!
sentences: Back up all files and programs.
Download Windows 8.1 preview ISO from the official website (http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-8/preview-iso)  Insert a blank disk into your Disk tray.
Burn the ISO image to a disk.
Reboot your PC with the disk still in the tray.
Go to your BIOS configuration screen.
Choose primary boot device as CD/DVD drive.
The system should boot to the Windows 8.1 setup screen.
If it doesn't you probably did something wrong.
Configure your PC settings in the setup.
Follow the setup instructions till the setup finishes.
